resources.string:
Socials Addict 
The Smartest,Fastest and most accurate social networks monitoring app.. 

this app is open source project made by Pi Developers Team and signed ander GNU public license, you may use the source code of this app for your own use or re-distrubute it but with mentioning the original source 

CHANGELOG: 
V6.4.2: 
UX and UI improvements 
Full material elements 
Bug fixes

Pi Developers 
Creativity is our middle name. 

We are team of young developers trying to indrotude new ideas to android users and make them use the most of their phones. 

Our goal is to provide same experince on all devices possible, we support all major android versions (3.3.x - 5.x)
